explanation: [0-0] A yellow excavator places its bucket on the ground. The driver, wearing a red shirt, is in the excavator. In front of the excavator is a pile of coal, and behind it are many white trucks.

[0-7] The excavator starts to move forward, scooping coal into its bucket. At this time, the front of a white truck appears behind the excavator. The truck continuously moves to the left. The excavator driver lowers his head as the bucket swings.
